messages.content: ComfyUI-YOLO is an Ultralytics-powered object recognition custom node for ComfyUI.
To install ComfyUI-YOLO, navigate to the custom/nodes directory in your ComfyUI installation and run the command: git clone https://github.com/kadirnar/ComfyUI-YOLO
Where can I find models for ComfyUI-YOLO?
You can find models for ComfyUI-YOLO on the Ultralytics Model Hub at https://github.com/ultralytics/assets/releases
How can I download a model from the Ultralytics Model Hub for ComfyUI-YOLO?

To download a model from the Ultralytics Model Hub for ComfyUI-YOLO, navigate to the models/ultralytics directory and run the command: wget https://github.com/ultralytics/assets/releases/download/v8.2.0/model_name.pt
What types of object recognition tasks can ComfyUI-YOLO perform?
ComfyUI-YOLO can perform object detection, video object detection, object segmentation, and object pose estimation using Ultralytics models.
Does ComfyUI-YOLO provide any image resizing functionality?
Yes, ComfyUI-YOLO includes an Ultralytics Resize Image node that allows resizing of images.
Is there a way to visualize bounding boxes with ComfyUI-YOLO?
Yes, ComfyUI-YOLO includes an Ultralytics Bbox Visualization node that provides bounding box visualization.
